uk.kludje

Interface CloseableResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UCloseableResource
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CloseableResource
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An AutoCloseable type without a throws declaration.

    For use in try-with-resources blocks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Overrides the parent method which throws Exception.
      default <T extends java.lang.Throwable>
      CloseableResource      		 expected()
      Fluent method for allowing an instance to declare it throws any Throwable.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Overrides the parent method which throws Exception. Combined with expected() this type can declare that it throws any type.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • expected

        default <T extends java.lang.Throwable> CloseableResource expected()
                                                            throws T extends java.lang.Throwable
        Fluent method for allowing an instance to declare it throws any Throwable.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of exception to expect
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        T extends java.lang.Throwable
        See Also:
        Exceptions.expected()
